text: Apologies for the #powercut in #Llanishen #CF14 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 19:30. Geraint
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to the #Leicester #LE5 and surrounding area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Andi.
Apologies for the ongoing #powercut affecting #LE5 #Leicester our engineers continue to work on the fault and are now estimating to have power restored by 09:00.  Siân
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #MoretonInMarsh #GL56 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut  Siân
Apologies for the #powercut in #GL56 #MoretonInMarsh & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 05:30.  Siân
Update #powercut #Leicester #LE5 & surrounding areas. We're sorry for the delay in restoring power, our engineers are working to have all properties back on by 07:00. Siân

There  is  a #powercut in #LE5 Leicester & surrounding areas. We're working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 02:30. We're currently switching to restore power sooner, this results in customers seeing brief interruptions. Apologies for the disruption.
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #CF14 #Cardiff area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut  Siân
Apologies for the #powercut in #Cardiff #CF14 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 01:00. Drew
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #BA5 #Wells area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut  Siân
All customers affected by the #powercut in #EX32 #Barnstaple now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.  Siân
Apologies for the #powercut in #Wells #BA5 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 18:30. Ellie
Apologies for the #powercut in #Barnstaple #EX32 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 17:00. Drew
All customers affected by the #powercut in #NewtonAbbot #TQ13 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused. Geraint
Apologies for the #powercut in #NewtonAbbot #TQ13 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 14:30. Geraint
All supplies to #NG9 #Bramcote #Nottingham have now been restored. Apologies to all customers affected by the #powercut  Siân

We're aware that properties are without power in #Bramcote #Nottingham #NG9 and surrounding areas. We aim to restore all supplies by 05:30. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut We're currently switching so customers will also see brief interruptions whilst we carry this out
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Shrewsbury #SY1 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.  Siân
Apologies for the ongoing #powercut affecting #SY1 #Shrewsbury our engineers continue to work on the fault and are now estimating to have power restored by 04:00.
We are aware that properties are without power in #Shrewsbury #SY1 and surrounding areas. We aim to restore all supplies by 01:00 Apologies to all affected by the #powercut  Siân
